rules.natural: Provided that the institution is authorized for research, then drug X is approved.
Under the condition that the grant has approved funding, drug X is approved.
Whenever bill 123 passes legislative vote, it becomes law.
Either bill 123 passes legislative vote or the president grants executive approval.
Provided that the president grants executive approval, then the grant has approved funding.
Whenever bill 123 becomes law, the FDA establishes guidelines.
If the FDA is created as an agency, then the institution is authorized for research.
Provided that the FDA establishes guidelines, then the FDA is created as an agency.
If the pharma company has exclusive rights, then drug X is approved.
Provided that the supplier engages in illegal import, then the supplier is a registered importer.
Whenever the supplier engages in illegal import, criminal charges are filed.
Either the supplier engages in illegal import or, if the pharma company has a patent, then it has exclusive rights.
Under the condition that the shipment is subject to customs seizure, then the supplier is not a registered importer.
If the FBI opens an investigation, then the shipment is subject to customs seizure.
Provided that criminal charges are filed, then the FBI opens an investigation.
Either the clinical trial phase is completed or the study passes peer review.
Whenever the study passes peer review, drug X is approved.
If an independent data audit is conducted, then, provided that the clinical trial phase is completed, drug X is approved.
Under the condition that the statistical analysis is valid, then, if the clinical trial phase is completed, drug X is approved.
Provided that the monitoring committee conducts a review, then an independent data audit is conducted.
Either the monitoring committee conducts a review or adverse events are reported.
Under the condition that a safety assessment is completed, then the statistical analysis is valid.
Provided that a protocol amendment is required, then the trial is suspended temporarily.
If a DSMB recommendation is issued, then, under the condition that it is not the case that if adverse events are reported then a safety assessment is completed, a protocol amendment is required.
Either a DSMB recommendation is issued or the FDA conducts a regulatory inspection.
Whenever the FDA conducts a regulatory inspection, then, provided that it is not the case that if adverse events are reported then a safety assessment is completed, a protocol amendment is required.
Either the quality control check fails or it is not the case that a manufacturing complaint is received.
Either a batch recall is initiated or it is not the case that the quality control check fails.
Either production is halted at the facility or it is not the case that a batch recall is initiated.
If the company makes a false claim, then it is not the case that the company violates a regulation.

Provided that a whistleblower report is submitted, then, under the condition that it is not the case that if it is not the case that the company makes a false claim then corrective action is taken, a warning letter is issued.

If a hearing is scheduled, then, under the condition that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if drug X is approved then clinical trials require approval then drug X has safety data then the committee does not pass review, drug X gets market approval.
Whenever the company violates a regulation, then the company pays a fine.
Under the condition that the company violates a regulation, then it is not the case that the company pays a fine.
Either the company violates a regulation or either the manufacturer submits a report or, if drug X is not approved, then it is not the case that the lab completes testing.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if adverse events are reported then a safety assessment is completed, then it is not the case that the trial is suspended temporarily.

Provided that it is not the case that either the manufacturer submits a report or, if drug X is not approved, then it is not the case that the lab completes testing, then a manufacturing complaint is received.
Under the condition that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if drug X is approved then clinical trials require approval then drug X has safety data, then the committee passes review.
Whenever it is not the case that the company makes a false claim, then it is not the case that corrective action is taken.
If drug X is not approved, then the lab completes testing.
